title: Most important export partner countries for Bangladesh in 2017
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total export in each Country on the y axis.
Country Germany has the highest Share in total export and Italy has the lowest Share in total export.
The difference of Share in total export between the highest and lowest Country is 8.8.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share in total export in the y axis.
The Share in total export is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Italy.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share in total export in each Country on the y axis.
Country Germany has the highest Share in total export and Italy has the lowest Share in total export.
The difference of Share in total export between the highest and lowest Country is 8.8.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share in total export for 6 number of Countrys.
The Share in total export is appeared to be the highest at Country Germany and lowest at Country Italy.
Country  has the second highest value for Share in total export.
The difference of Share in total export between the highest and lowest Country is 8.8.
Share in total export at Country Germany is 12.9 , second place is  at 12.9, and thirdly is United Kingdom at 8.7.
The lowest value 4.1 at Italy is almost 1.6 times smaller than the average value 8.05.
The Share in total export is 48.3 if we add up values of all Countrys.
